name: Testris (kmakai)
description:
fully open source!

Instructions:

  • BACKSPACE to rewind
  • ESCAPE to change options
  • z/x to rotate
  • SHIFT to store
  • UP to drop
  • LEFT/RIGHT/DOWN to move
  • ENTER or click to select in menus

Features:

  • Customizable controls
  • Record and play back replay files
  • c l a s s i c  g a m e p l a y
